description: Retrieves a list of workflow runs of a specified workflow.

parameters.name: projectName
parameters.description: The name of the project in the space.

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: Information used to sort the items in the returned list. (dict) --- Information used to sort workflow runs in the returned list.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: A token returned from a call to this API to indicate the next batch of results to return, if any.

nested_items.name: items
nested_items.description: Information about the runs of a workflow.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The system-generated unique ID of the workflow run.

nested_items.name: workflowId
nested_items.description: The system-generated unique ID of the workflow.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the workflow run.

nested_items.name: statusReasons
nested_items.description: The reasons for the workflow run status.

nested_items.name: startTime
nested_items.description: The date and time the workflow run began, in coordinated universal time (UTC) timestamp format as specified in RFC 3339.

nested_items.name: endTime
nested_items.description: The date and time the workflow run ended, in coordinated universal time (UTC) timestamp format as specified in RFC 3339

nested_items.name: lastUpdatedTime
nested_items.description: The date and time the workflow was last updated, in coordinated universal time (UTC) timestamp format as specified in RFC 3339
